constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 84 (Friday, May 14, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SHERMAN:
H.R. 3260.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
The power granted to Congress under Article I, Section 8,
Clauses 1 and 18 of the United States Constitution.
[Page H2357]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

title: To amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to require that certain issuers make disclosures regarding general ledger accounts reconciliation, and for other purposes.
